description.name: Nicolas Torres
description.text: , a Full-Stack Web Engineer specialized in TypeScript, Next.js, React, Node.js, and AI-augmented systems. I've delivered scalable software to clients across Germany, Singapore, the U.S., and Chileâ€”maintaining a 100% Job Success Score as a Top Rated talent on Upwork.
description.focus: My focus is building clean, fast, and purposeful products that elevate how teams operate.

problem.title: Tired of Developers
problem.subtitle: You need a
problem.subtitleEnd: , not a robot. Someone who understands your business, thinks like an owner, and delivers code that truly moves the needle.
problem.sectionTitle: Most common problems I see in development teams:

technicalDebt.name: Technical Debt (Spaghetti Code)
technicalDebt.description: Fragile systems where fixing one bug creates three new ones. Scaling becomes expensive and risky.

noVision.name: Executors without Vision
noVision.description: Developers who act like robots: they wait for exact orders and don't warn about UX or business mistakes.

ghostDeadlines.name: Ghost Deadlines
ghostDeadlines.description: Estimates that are never met. Tickets drag on week after week without a real delivery date.

excuses.name: Excuses, not Results
excuses.description: The classic 'it works on my machine' mentality. When there's a fire in production, nobody takes control.

scalableArchitecture.name: Scalable Architecture
scalableArchitecture.description: I write clean, modular, and documented code. Your project will be easy to maintain today and scale tomorrow.

productPartner.name: Product Partner
productPartner.description: I don't just code; I understand your business. I propose strategic improvements to maximize product value.

totalOwnership.name: Total Ownership
totalOwnership.description: I treat your project as if it were mine. If a problem arises, I take responsibility and lead the solution to the end.

radicalTransparency.name: Radical Transparency
radicalTransparency.description: No confusing jargon. I maintain constant communication so you always know the real state of development.

projects.section_subtitle: Explore my latest work and creative solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Building software with soul and precision
about.description: I'm NicolÃ¡s Richard Torres, a Chilean full-stack engineer who believes code shouldn't just work: it should have purpose. I went from breaking systems out of curiosity to designing structures with ethics. Today I transform ideas into platforms that combine art, engineering, and a dose of well-directed rebellion.

methodology.title: Philosophy and Methodology
methodology.description: My way of working is based on three pillars: clarity in architecture, autonomy to solve, and impact in every line of code. I rely on strict typing, living documentation, and transparent communication.

workStyle.title: Work Style
workStyle.description: Agile, autonomous, and detail-oriented. I propose solutions rather than wait for instructions.

personal.title: Beyond the Code
personal.description: I'm inspired by Hofmann and Leary, but also by the silence of the forest. Between commits and coffee, I study AI, explore responsible psychedelics, and create content for other developers. I believe that justiceâ€”even in softwareâ€”is a form of love.

specialties.description: Next.js, React, TypeScript, and systems where the interface matters as much as the logic.

stack.description: Node.js, Prisma ORM, tRPC, PostgreSQL, and scalable architectures with frictionless deployments.
